Name: B-RAIN
About the game: B-RAIN is a game to avoid bullets by matching its color with its color. Gameplay The player can change the color of the immovable square in the center to four. You can avoid matching colors with bullets flying in random colors among the four colors. Of course, if you touch a bullet in a different color, you will die. I hope you survive as long as possible!
